feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService
feed.rights: Copyright Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited, 2025. Licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0.

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale northwesterlies gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria, especially about the ranges. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 180 to 230 mm of rain about the ranges, and 60 to 90 mm of rain about the coast. Peak intensities of 25 to 35 mm/h about the ranges, with thunderstorms likely. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal. Changes: Today's (Wednesday's) heavy rain is easing. This Orange Warning is now for the next period of heavy rain on Thursday.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 180 to 230 mm of rain about the main divide, and 90 to 140 mm within 20 km farther east. Thunderstorms possible. Peak rates of 25 to 35 mm/h expected about the divide. Freezing level 3000m. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain and possible thunderstorms. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain and thunderstorms, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northerly winds may approach severe gale in exposed places, especially about the coast. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect a further 40 to 50 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen, with possible thunderstorms. Peak intensities of 15 to 20 mm/h. Note, a second period of heavy rain and possible thunderstorms is forecast for Thursday morning and afternoon, and another Watch or Warning may be issued for this later today. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A period of heavy rain and possible thunderstorms. Amounts may approach warning criteria, mostly about the ranges. Rain easing from the south this morning. Note, a second period of heavy rain and possible thunderstorms is forecast for Thursday morning and afternoon, and another Watch or Warning may be issued for this later today. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: Chance of upgrade reduced to low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
